mods.abstract: The story of the Yup'ik people of Newtok, Alaska, who are being forced to relocate their village due to the erosion and flooding they are experiencing as a result of global warming. We meet some of the people who are being called America's first 'climate refugees,' and learn about the history and culture of the Yup'ik people of Newtok.
